extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
Are you ready to play?
Magic: The Gathering, the world's most popular trading card game, has redefined the concept of card games. Strategy is the key to the fun and excitement in playing Magic. This portable box contains everything two people need to learn the game, including:
• two 56-card preconstructed decks, ready-to-play
• two guides, containing step-by-step instructions
• quick-reference cards
• one official Magic rulebook
Magic: The Gathering is set in the imaginary worlds of Dominia, where powerful wizards battle for control of the landscape. The rival twin wizards, Kazz and Zakk, will lead you through your first game of Magic. Powerful creatures and spells are at your disposal, which you use to reduce your opponent's 20 life to zero. If you accomplish this first, you've won the game!
